sub_title: Senior System Architect at EPAM Systems
summary:
Over 15 years leading the software design and development at multiple companies that have grown over the 100-person mark. Systems Architect at EPAM leading DevOps teams that helped to scale Tipico, Rightscale, Liberty Global International, Schoolbalzer, Ncube, EPAM and Altoros Development

Worked in Agile environment in various roles – System engineer, Software developer, Architect, Head of DevOPS department. Strong focus on automation,costs, stability and standardization.
My most relevant experience includes:
- IT organization optimization
- DevOps transformation
- Stabilization of the distributed systems, full stack troubleshooting
- Architecture of high availability, 
- Distributed systems design, optimization and support
- Monitoring, instrumentation and alerting
- Cloud engineering and datacenter migrations to cloud environments

Tools: Chef, OpenStack, AWS, RightScale platform', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Nick', 'last_name': 'Stakanov', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior System Architect at EPAM Systems'}]}, {'title': 'tipico.com deployment Automation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': 'Team lead of Chef Automation Development team
 Full automation for infrastructure running in Private cloud Openstack + Bare metal: orchestration layer automation, system layer, application layer.
Some facts:
	• 40 different application instance types
	• 30 environments active (12 different instances minimum each) instance number is different per environment
	• DevOPS Team – 3 persons (environment management)
	• ChefDev Team - 8 persons
	• Developer – 12 Teams 
	• More than 70 hosts on prod environment across the different DC’s in EU
 
•	Architecture design and implementation of complete 3 layer (cloud/root/unprivileged) Chef provision for customer application, Sport betting analysis area:
•	DevOPS automation team lead on customer side.
•		Full automation of environment setup operations\xa0
•		Infrastructure codified, this allows to store the code in VCS and use Unit and Functional testing\xa0
•		Abstraction from Hardware layer – we can build on different clouds types (Openstack, Backspace, Physical HW) and hybrid cloud environments\xa0(Openstack + Backspace + Physical HW)
•		Environment creation time decrease from 1 week to 2 hours
•		Full control on environment state (we know the exact state of each instance in given environment)
•		Highly modular code architecture, which allows to easily build new types of instances and modify existing
•		Automation of instance names generation according to predefined rules and templates
•		Automation of Integration with the set of 3rd party services such as CloudFlare, Zabbix, etc.
•		Service discovery pattern implemented which allows dynamic modification of environment members (add new instances, remove existing, modify number of application instances per physical host)
•		Autoscaling
•		Ready CMDB and Reporting services
•		Centralized access management\xa0
•		Integration with CI Jenkins (new artifacts deploy)

Worked with the services and internal support teams on requirement gathering and development of new enhancements.

In details:
Develop new Linux based Server Templates for RS hybrid cloud platform, testing automation.
Adaptation of existing chef ST and images to run on a new clouds.
Automated deployment of 3 tier architecture (load balancers, application servers, database managers) and adaptation of 3t to hybrid cloud environment.
Configuration of automated connection between 3 tier components (LB <-> APP <-> DBM).
Application deployment automation (LAMP, passenger, django and tomcat 6/7 application servers)
Virtual cloud storage, HA storage solutions, Backup/restore (block device, snapshots to different clouds, remote object storage)
Database tuning, configuration, replication configuration (MySQL, PostgreSQL)
Network security and authentication (SSH, SSL, iptables, cloud firewalls - security groups)
Comprehensive monitoring solutions (nagios, collectd+rrdgraph, systats, cloud apis to get current instance state)
Logging solutions (rsyslog, syslog-ng) logging standalone servers
Automation of fqdn bindings to cloud instance public/private ips (DME, Route53, DynDNS)
Design and design implementation tracking of new solutions (new features, new server templates)
Automated testing/Issues fix in existing Server templates (chef related, cloud related, RS core services related)
Experience with OpenStack based clouds
